Generation VI.X: These friendly Pokémon send signals to one another with beautiful chirps and tail-feather movements.
Generation VI.Y: Despite the beauty of its lilting voice, it's merciless to intruders that enter its territory.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: These friendly Pokémon send signals to one another with beautiful chirps and tail-feather movements.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Despite the beauty of its lilting voice, it's merciless to intruders that enter its territory.

Generation VII.Sun: This amiable Pokémon is easy to train. But when battle is joined, it shows its ferocious side.
Generation VII.Moon: When it's excited, its temperature can double, spiking hormone production in its body.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: While it's an amiable Pokémon, if you touch it unexpectedly, it will heat up its body in an instant, and you'll be burned.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: Its body is always warm. Trainers who live in cold areas apparently sleep with it in their bed.

Generation VIII.Sword: Its melodious cries are actually warnings. Fletchling will mercilessly peck at anything that enters its territory.
Generation VIII.Shield: When this Pokémon gets excited, its body temperature increases sharply. If you touch a Fletchling with bare hands, you might get burned.

Generation IX.Scarlet: This Pokémon is normally calm, but once it enters battle, its hormonal balance changes and it becomes aggressive.
Generation IX.Violet: Fletchling can be found in both rural and urban areas. They once had a huge territorial dispute with Squawkabilly . Fights broke out all over town.

Generation VIII.Expansion Pass: Challenge Road , Loop Lagoon , Potbottom Desert Fields of Honor , Loop Lagoon ( Max Raid Battle )

Generation IX.Scarlet: South Province: Area One , Area Two , Area Five , Poco Path South Province: Area Two ( Fire Tera Type ) Tera Raid Battles ( 2★ )
Generation IX.Violet: South Province: Area One , Area Two , Area Five , Poco Path South Province: Area Two ( Fire Tera Type ) Tera Raid Battles ( 2★ )
Generation IX.The Hidden Treasure of Area Zero: Coastal Biome , Torchlit Labyrinth , Canyon Biome
